item.title: Karnataka Weather: Bengaluru, Raichur And Other Districts Likely To See Rain From Dec 12-14 | Check Forecast
item.description:
<![CDATA[Karnataka Weather: The India Meteorological Department (IMD) in Bengaluru has predicted light to moderate rainfall for the city from December 12 to 14. This weather pattern is linked to a developing low-pressure area over the south-east Bay of Bengal and the adjacent east equatorial Indian Ocean.
The IMD stated that this low-pressure system is expected to move west to north-west over the next day and is likely to strengthen. By December 11, it should reach the south-west Bay of Bengal near the ...]]>
